StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: I am a Data Engineer with 2 years of professional experience in Data Warehousing, ETL and Business Intelligence in retail and e-commerce. I am passionate and quick learner professional having demonstrated ability to work in agile environment.

PositionHistory.Title: Project Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Client: Walmart
Project Description: Managing large scale data of Online Grocery of Walmart U.S. and building dashboards for analyzing different Key Performance Indicators.
Responsibilities: Building data pipeline and ETL flow to load historical and incremental business data from different source systems like Oracle, MySQL to target tables in Teradata. Writing HiveQL to load data consumed from Kafka to Hive tables. Writing proper logic and implementing in Teradata SQL to derive different metrics. Developing Tableau Dashboards to report different Key Performance Indicators as required by business managers. Scheduling Teradata and Hive scripts by Automic tool for batch processing. Analyzing and fixing any mismatch in Financial, Operational and Customer Satisfaction related metrics.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 343585c09211d4e58485f0f1207006&sid=3810263223&AT=1580681700 2/2/20 23&16
? Communicating across different teams to ensure meeting SLA of batch. ? Deputed in client location (Walmart Global Technology Services, Bangalore).
I am currently serving Notice Period.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 65% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Electronics/Telecommunication) from MAULANA ABUL KALAM AZAD UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY, WEST BENGAL in 2017

Writing HiveQL to load data consumed from Kafka to Hive tables. Writing proper logic and implementing in Teradata SQL to derive different metrics. Developing Tableau Dashboards to report different Key Performance Indicators as required by business managers. Scheduling Teradata and Hive scripts by Automic tool for batch processing. Analyzing and fixing any mismatch in Financial, Operational and Customer Satisfaction related metrics.
